doc.field: This series contains materials created for and during Paper Tiger TV's various activities. It is broken up into four subseries. The first, "Programming", contains materials related to the television shows produced by PTTV. The next, "Exhibits and Installations", contains materials created for exhibits and installations PTTV organized thoughout the world. The third subseries, "Workshops and Conferences" contains materials created in workshops and conferences, as well as organizational materials. The last subseries, "Film Festivals and Screenings" contains applications to and programs for film festivals that PTTV had material shown in, flyers for screenings of PTTV shows, and all other material related to the screening of PTTV material.
